description: Convert a PPM image to an ASCII image using ANSI terminal color codes. See also: ppmtoterm, pbmtoascii, pbmto4425. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/ppmtoascii.html.

useCases.description: Convert a PPM image to an ASCII image, combining an area of 1x2 pixels into a character:
Convert a PPM image to an ASCII image, combining an area of 2x4 pixels into a character:
